title: Winsome Halifax Storage Mobile Cabinets, 1 Door, 3 Drawers, 2 Wide Drawers, for Home Office, Black
description: The Winsome Halifax 3-Section Mobile Storage Cabinet is ideal for all of your storage needs. With its clean, simple design, you can use it anywhere. It's the perfect organizer for your knitting, sewing, or craft supplies. Rejuvenate your garage space, mud room, or shed while providing much needed space to keep tools or sports gear organized. Or use it in a walk-in closet to expand your storage for clothing, linens, handbags and other accessories. This Halifax Cabinet features five gliding drawers with cut-out handles for easy access. The large drawers have interior dimensions of 27.5"W x 11.7"D x 2.56"H, just the place for artwork, maps, or clothing items you'd prefer to store flat and lengthwise. Three smaller drawers with interior dimensions of 13.2"W x 11.7"D x 2.5"H provide additional storage space, and taller items such as boots or backpacks can be kept in the side cabinet. The unit has five wheels, two of which lock, for easy mobility as well as a way to keep it securely in place. The Cabinet is made of sturdy composite wood in a contemporary black finish that will blend with any decor. For additional storage, combine the 3-Section Cabinet with other organizers from the Winsome Halifax collection. This item conveniently ships in 1 box and is ready for assembly. Replacement part request can be submitted directly to the manufacturer within 60 days from date of purchase. Overall dimensions: 26.3"H x 30.7"W x 15.9"D Static weight capacity for top is 35 lbs. Large drawer inside dimension: 27.5"W x 11.7"D x 2.5"H - static weight capacity large drawer is 15 lbs. Small drawer inside dimensions: 13.2"W x 11.7"D x 2.5"H - static weight capacity small drawer is 12 lbs. Cabinet inside dimensions: 13.7"W x 14.7"D x 13.6"H - static weight capacity for cabinet is 25 lbs. 5 wheels, two of which lock Assembly required Ships in 1 box
